name: Double Dash - Game For Kids
description:
Double Dash - Game For Kids: Super addictive hard and challenging game. Play online and compete with your friends to be the best Double Dash player. It's easy, you just have to touch the screen to jump or change direction, remember to keep on the path without fall. Collect diamonds to unlock levels and features. Keep playing to unlock all the characters in over 50 levels. You can also use the snail option to get some help.

How to Play Double Dash

- Tap to jump or change direction
- Keep running and collect diamonds
- Unlock Levels
- Unlock new characters
- Don't fall and keep on the path

Game Features

- 50 different levels.
- Over 8 Characters.
- 6 cool animals.
- Change background colors.
- Support touch controllers.
- Nice graphics and sounds.
